section.7: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Nafi' that Ibn 'Umar gave a call to prayer on a cold and windy night, and he said:"Pray where you are, for the Prophet (S.A.W)used to order the Mu'adhdhin, if it was a cold and rainy night, to say: 'Pray in your dwellings
